page.title: 17VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Kippen has many varied activities for all ages. There is a{Mother and {Toddler Group}which meets in the Village Hall every Thursday morning. {The Playgroup}meets each morning from Tuesday to Friday. There is a{Social {Club}for pensioners which meets each Wednesday afternoon for carpet bowls, darts,cards,tea and outings.For the ladies there is the{Women's Guild}and the{W.R.I.}which meets on the 3rd Wednesday of every month,for talks and competitions.There is a{curling club, a{summer ice club,}a{badminton club, a{fishing club}up at{Loch Laggan}and an active{bowling club}in{Fore Road with a very fine green and clubhouse. The{W.V.S.}provide{"Meals on wheels" for the old people as well as carrying out many other Community Services. There is also a{Horticultural Society now in its{84th year.
